meanings.definition: A rare earth metallic element, atomic number 61.
meanings.sent1: Promethium is a rare metal found in the earth.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study promethium to learn more about its properties.

meanings.sent5: The hum of the promethium battery was a constant reminder of its power source.
